title: MONOWAVE
summary: Puzzle-platformer game project by team BBB. Exhibited at BIC Festival and Burning Beaver, and selected in Made With Unity Korea Award.

title: Signal Journey
summary: VR interaction project exploring proximity and emotion through multimodal cues (visual, audio, and thermal stimuli).

title: PHOTOWAVE
summary: AI-powered photo kiosk project using facial-expression recognition; evaluated through exhibition-based user observation.

title: My Cat is VIRTUALLY Cute, or Maybe Not?
summary: XR simulation game with Leap Motion hand-gesture interaction; advanced to the 3rd round of the 2023 Metaverse Developer Contest.

title: BACKSEAT PROGRAMMER
summary: Korean voice-recognition driving game project developed for NLP coursework; received a convergence technology contest award.
